lead_paragraph: Chinese news reports said the German head of a truck and bus division used bigoted language and pepper spray in a parking dispute, setting off a furor on social media.

headline.print_headline: German’s Slur of Chinese Costs His Job, Reports Say
headline.main: Daimler Executive Is Removed After Accusations of Insulting Chinese

snippet: Chinese news reports said the German head of a truck and bus division used bigoted language and pepper spray in a parking dispute, setting off a furor on social media....
abstract: Daimler Greater China, unit of German automaker Daimler, removes manager Rainer Gartner from job after he was accused of bigoted outburst during dispute over parking spot.
